metadata.title: CVE-2017-5969 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** libxml2 2.9.4, when used in recover mode, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via acrafted XML document.  NOTE: The maintainer states "I would disagree of aCVE with the Recover parsing option which should only be used for manualrecovery at least for XML parser."

criterions.comment: libxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
